channel.title: [Help]Compiler[Help]
channel.description:
well i'm using 614 new source server and i need help with compiler's in client there's 1 it keeps saying... The system cannont find the path specified Press any key to continue . . . In source some says "javac" is not recogized as an internal or external command. operable program or batch files. press any key to continue...
-please and thank you-

item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help]
item.dc:creator: @xdstyle007 xdstyle007
item.description:
@xdstyle007 wrote:

[quote=“Dragon 202, post:1, topic:375067”]well i’m using 614 new source server and i need help with compiler’s in client there’s 1 it keeps saying…
The system cannont find the path specified
Press any key to continue . . .
In source some says
“javac” is not recogized as an internal or external command.
operable program or batch files.
press any key to continue…

-please and thank you-[/quote]
You need to set Environment variables—> Watch this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FAglfB8h8uU (I didnt made this video)

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help]
item.dc:creator: @Dragon_202 Dragon 202
item.description:
@Dragon_202 wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling
javac -d bin -cp lib/cache.jar;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/netty-3.1.5.GA.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar -sourcepath src src\dragonkk\rs2rsps*.java
pause

I got jdk1.6.0_22
and jre6

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help]
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

you need to download the latests version of java or edit your compiler to the version of yours
this is done by going to c:/>progamfiles>java and you should find your version of jdk then replace the _21 (or whatever it is) to your version
hope that helps

Read full topic
